body_html:
I now agree that the change I attempted is incorrect c++. I was confused by "type name" appearing in the error message.
As far as I can tell, the correct version of this line is typename TTypes<T, 4>::ConstTensor input_data = input.template tensor<T, 4>();
That compiles under gcc and icc. The versions of this issue that appear in the codebase are .tensor<...>(), ->tensor<...>(), and .shaped<...>() Correcting them all with a script allows the original command to complete without errors. I will submit a patch soon.
body:
I now agree that the change I attempted is incorrect c++. I was confused by "type name" appearing in the error message.
As far as I can tell, the correct version of this line is `typename TTypes<T, 4>::ConstTensor input_data = input.template tensor<T, 4>();`
That compiles under gcc and icc. The versions of this issue that appear in the codebase are `.tensor<...>()`, `->tensor<...>()`, and `.shaped<...>()` Correcting them all with a script allows the original command to complete without errors. I will submit a patch soon.
